Wildrider looked down at Symphony, and started to laugh. He then lifted
his head up from behind cover, and looked around. He realised what was
going on, "Symphony, pmhahh, you stay here and give me cover fire on
that robot" he said, pointing towards Incarcinerator. He jumped up past
the hill, and transformed, hitting the ground with a tire wrenching
250mph squeal, and roared towards his comerades.


OOC: So Dcoburn, Slaughter can't be detected by defense systems?

BIC:
As soon as Quatro launched his attack, eight hiddent laser turrets
extended out of the ground. They each then displayed four laser cannons,
and began to all spin. Each time one made a revolution, it would fire
towards Quatro. (Your in over your head)

Quatro's fire power passed the turrets, and nailed the base, charring
the side. Luckily they hit the heavily armored side of the base.
